html.OD_MF_DOWN_PAYMENT_DESC_HTML:
We took a quick look at your account history and we'll need a down payment before we can start your monthly payments.


Don't worry, this isn't unusual. We'd require it even if you got the device at a store. Plus, a down payment means your monthly payments will be even lower.

label.OD_MF_MAIN_PRICE_TITLE: Almost done, how would you like to pay ?
label.OD_MF_PRICE_SUBTITLE: Taxes will be shown in your cart.
label.OD_MF_DOWN_PAYMENT_MODAL_TITLE: Make a down payment and you'll be all set
label.OD_MF_SHIP_BY_MODAL_DESCRIPTION1_TEXT: This item is currently out of stock, but if you place your order we'll ship it as soon as we have more.
label.OD_MF_SHIP_BY_MODAL_DESCRIPTION2_TEXT: Our shipping dates are just estimates, but we'll be sure to email you when your order is on the way.
label.OD_MF_SHIP_BY_MODAL_DESCRIPTION3_TEXT: Don't worry.you won't be charged until your order ships.
label.OD_MF_DOWN_PAYMENT_TITLE: Looks like we'll need a down payment.
label.OD_MF_SHIP_BY_MODAL_PREORDER_DESCRIPTION: This item is not available yet. Pre-order it today and we will as soon as it is available.
